message: Fair and simple, let's start with a clean slate!
Time to get a bit more aggressive!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much!
Getting a bit more serious now...
I'm not going to give in that easily, Bob!
Getting down to the wire, Alice...
I'm not going to let you walk all over me, Bob!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! I'll make one more offer!
You're running out of time, Alice...
I'm not going to accept such a lopsided offer, Bob! I'll make one more attempt to get a fair deal!
